darkMode.description: Use dark theme for the app

import.description: Import your data from a backup file

export.title: Export Data

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.importSuccessMessage: The model {{name}} was successfully imported and is now available for use.

defaultPrompt.title: Default System Prompt
defaultPrompt.description: System instructions used to guide AI responses in conversations

ai.setupError: Model was imported but failed to set up AI assistant:

models.title: AI Models
models.needsConfiguration: AI features need to be configured. This could be due to hardware limitations, network issues, or incomplete setup.

delete.title: Delete Model
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.

error.noAIModelsDescription: No AI models are currently installed. Import a model to get started.
error.noAIModelManagerDescription: The AI model manager is not initialized. Please try again later.

models.importFromFileDescription: Select a local file to import the model
models.importFromUrlDescription: Download a model from a remote location
models.noModelsDescription: You have no AI models installed. Import a model to get started.
models.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.

contact.created: AI Contact created. You can now chat with this model in the Messages tab.

local.title: Local AI
local.description: Local AI model for offline use

threads.title: CPU Threads
threads.description: Number of CPU threads to use for inference

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key for cloud services

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness (0.0 - 1.0, lower is more deterministic)

presencePenalty.title: Presence Penalty
presencePenalty.description: Penalize tokens based on presence (-2.0 to 2.0)

device.title: Device Settings
device.discoveryDescription: Search for other devices on the network
device.discoveryEnabledDesc: Search for other devices on the network
device.addOnlyConnectedDesc: Only add devices to settings when a connection is established
device.noDevices: No devices found. Enable discovery to find nearby devices.
device.noDevicesWithDiscoveryEnabled: No devices found. Make sure your ESP32 devices are powered on and connected to the same network.
device.noDevicesWithDiscoveryDisabled: No devices found. Enable device discovery to find nearby devices.
device.noConnectedDevices: No connected devices. Discovered devices will appear here when connected.
device.discoveryDisabled: Device discovery is disabled. Enable it to find nearby devices.
device.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this device?

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.syncDescription: Import contacts from your device's address book
contacts.permissionDenied: Permission to access contacts was denied

invalidModelInput: Please enter both name and URL for the model
